Contact Us
jalgu
2022-11-14T17:29:26-05:00
CONTACT US
We Want to Hear From You
Your Name
*
This field is hidden when viewing the form
Your Email (old)
Your Email
*
Subject
Your Message
What is 5 + three? (Answer in digits)
Δ
Address:
35 NE Pine Island Rd
Cape Coral, FL 33909
Phone:
239.574.4-FUN(386)
Social Media:
At Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park, we strive to be the best indoor and outdoor amusement center in Cape Coral and all of Southwest Florida. We hope to achieve this with our wide array of activities that are suitable for people of all ages. This includes our state-of-the-art arcade with the latest VR games, adventure courses with zip lining and rock wall climbing, paintball, ax throwing, mini golf course, go-karts, and more.
We are continuously looking to expand our operations with new and exciting activities so we will continue to be the best amusement center in Cape Coral. Mini golf, VR arcades, ax throwing, rope courses – we’ve got it all! And we are always looking for feedback from our guests to hear what they liked about their experience, as well as what they think could be improved. After all, the only way we can improve our guest experience is through direct and honest feedback from customers like you!
Beyond offering nonstop fun, we are focused on offering all of our guests a safe and comfortable experience. We have several rules and policies in place to ensure the safety and comfort of all of our guests in all of our activities. For example, our paintball courses, go-kart courses, and axe throwing activities are all overseen by trained professionals for your safety. And we keep the best maintained mini golf course and VR arcade in Cape Coral. If you have an upcoming visit and are concerned about the procedures in place, we would be happy to answer any questions you might have.
We are always on the lookout for new employees to join our team. If that sounds like you, then mosey on over to our
employment page
. If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about a past or upcoming visit to Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park, the best amusement center in Cape Coral, please fill out our contact form. We can’t wait to hear from you!
SIGN UP FOR DEALS & COUPONS

Parties & Events
jalgu
2023-06-29T11:37:31-04:00
PARTIES & EVENTS
at Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park
Rent space for a party at Cape Coral’s top events venue!
Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park is the perfect place for a birthday party, youth group outing, or any other type of celebration or get-together. As the most complete events venue in Cape Coral, we have a wide range of fun activities that are great for people of all ages.
Experience cutting-edge technology when you step into Cape Coral’s only Virtuix Omni Arena, where you can experience the next generation of gaming with state-of-the-art VR technology. Or explore our arcade, which is jam packed with great games.
You can break into teams and play adrenaline-pumping games of paintball for an afternoon of friendly combat. When you want to rent space for a party in Cape Coral, and you’ve got all types of people attending, we recommend our low-impact paintball option for younger groups or anyone who is interested in a more casual paintball experience, and we also offer traditional paintball. Either way, it’s the perfect way to get out and celebrate while getting some exercise while enjoying Cape Coral’s best events venue. Note, waivers are required for all paintball participants.
For older groups, we have an Axe Throwing venue that’s great for 18+ birthday parties, bachelor/bachelorette parties, team building, and more. What other birthday party places in Cape Coral offer that? Rent space for a party that no one in your group will ever forget! And even if your group has never been axe throwing before, don’t worry. We will train you how to throw so you can have fun and stay safe!
If you’re looking to strengthen team bonds and build up confidence, then try out the aerial ropes, zipline, and climbing walls at the most popular family-friendly events venue in Cape Coral! Rent space for a party at Gator Mike’s, and all of these exhilarating experiences are sure to get your blood pumping and build connections between you and the rest of your group.
We have all of that to offer and more for your party or special event. Contact the best event center in Cape Coral today to reserve your group’s spot for an unforgettable day of fun and excitement! If you’re not sure how to rent a space for a party, or what to book for your group, we are happy to work with you to plan your next event. You’ve found the best birthday party place in Cape Coral, so what are you waiting for? Start planning your fun-filled day at Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park!
Birthday Parties
Group Outings
